data.text: @tia_loret In terms of hospitals, all should be on the chart if they have an A&E. But bear in mind the percentages aren't the risk of catching it - they're of total covid diagnoses. It's much more difficult to estimate risk, which will vary even within one hospital.

@tia_loret Sorry, I don't mean to dismiss the risks - I'm part of a campaign to reduce them! But I'd hate to think that people might not access the treatment they need, in situations where avoiding hospitals may be a greater risk. I'll definitely continue to push to reduce them. 1/
